snippet: Andy Murray's preparations for this month's Australian Open suffered a setback on Wednesday when the world number two went down in straight sets to local favorite Nick Kyrgios at the Hopman Cup in Perth....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray's preparations for this month's Australian Open suffered a setback on Wednesday when the world number two went down in straight sets to local favorite Nick Kyrgios at the Hopman Cup in Perth.

headline.print_headline: Murray Suffers Straight-Sets Loss to Kyrgios at Hopman Cup
headline.main: Murray Suffers Straight-Sets Loss to Kyrgios at Hopman Cup
